entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
